About

Hey there! This is Rohit Varkey Thankachan's blog, a Computer Science undergrad at National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal. I am passionate about the open source world, a Pythonista, and I have worked on some web development projects!

I am also a Kerala Blasters and Manchester United fan!

You can find my projects on my Github repository.

You can find me on :

  • Facebook
  • Twitter

This blog is built using Jekyll using the brilliant Hyde theme and hosted on Github Pages!
